summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1470, for the improvement of Phinney Avenue, from North 50th Street, to North 65th Street, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 15791 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
